hadiths.text: Narrated Al-Aswad:I asked `Aisha what did the Prophet (ﷺ) use to do at home. She replied. "He used to keep himself busy serving his family and when it was time for the prayer, he would get up for prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب كَيْفَ يَكُونُ الرَّجُلُ فِي أَهْلِهِ
chapter.eng-name: How should a man be with his family?
